  • Method Details

    • approveStudent

      void approveStudent(int studentId) throws StudentNotApprovedException, StudentNotFoundException
      Approves a student based on their student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to approve.
      Throws:
      StudentNotApprovedException - If the student could not be approved.
      StudentNotFoundException - If the student is not found.

    • addCourse

      void addCourse(Course course) throws CourseNotAddedException
      Adds a new course to the system.
      Parameters:
      course - The course to add.
      Throws:
      CourseNotAddedException - If the course could not be added.

      Throws:
      ProfessorNotAddedException - If the professor could not be added.
